item.description:
This will be a great weekend ride, lots of twisties and tight corners! It will be fast paced and aggressive. The plan is to ride in CT on Saturday and head to VT for Sunday. The exact route map and hotel details will be confirmed as we approach the date.

Folks coming from Boston, will meet t the Westborough service plaza and then head to Bristol CT

Dunkin Donuts
15 Pine St, Bristol, CT

We'll meet everyone at DD @ 9.30am

Here is the URL for our ride on Sat on Google maps

http://g.co/maps/fddp6

 We will leave Bristol head out to Rt 128,about 45 mins,where we will eat Brkfast at the Wondering Moose Cafe then  head into Dutchess, NY which is about 15 mins away, we will ride around Dutchess leaving enough daylight to get to Pittsfield,Mass approx 90 mins away,counting your drive down at this point you will be clocking around 270 miles give or take depending how much time we spend in Dutches as there is alot of little loops to hit,we'll play it by ear. Second portion of the map will be posted tomorrow.

final map

http://g.co/maps/dm5xy
item.name: Northwestern CT, Dutchess County NY - weekend ride
